original_text:
The Lord has done great things for us,
    and we are filled with joy.
korean_text: 여호와께서 우리를 위하여 큰 일을 행하셨으니 우리는 기쁘도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord has done great things for us
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 우리를 위해 큰 일들을 행하셨다

sentences.original_text: and we are filled with joy
